alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 12:31AM CDT until November 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1230 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Green Hill to 10 miles south of Huttig, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Beekman around 1255 AM CDT. Galion around 110 AM CDT. Jones around 120 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mer Rouge, Bonita and Blanchton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
